query: On top of BERT does the RNN layer work better or the transformer layer?
predict: The RNN layer performs better on top of BERT compared to the transformer layer.
reasoning: Answer A states that the transformer layer works better on top of BERT, while Answer B claims that the RNN layer performs better than the transformer layer when added to BERT.
